Set path to small-rna-analysis

```{r load}
d<-read.table("adapter_removal/prepare/stats.tsv",sep="\t",header=T)
head(d)
mean.mapped<-colMeans(d[,4:ncol(d)])
sum.mapped<-colSums(d[,4:ncol(d)])

tot<-read.table("fasta/define.cluster.Dec/res/ann.tab",header=T,sep="\t")
mean.tot<-colMeans(tot[grepl("tRNA",tot$ann),3:30])
sum.tot<-colSums(tot[grepl("tRNA",tot$ann),3:30])
```


```{r plot}
plot(sum.mapped/tot.counts, type='h',
     xlab="samples", ylab="excluded/included seqs")
```

```{r average}
hist(mean.mapped)
hist(mean.tot)
```
